channel.title: Looking For Source Coder/Staff [We need you! :p]
channel.description:
[b][size=10pt]I am looking for a Person willing to dedicate his time into helping edit my source then eventually becoming a staff on our server. Our server is currently being hosted on a vps for Beta Testing and Etc.
Hopefully, you some one will be able to help![/size][/b] [b][size=10pt]And dont worry you dont have to have very much Exp. as a Source coder![/size][/b]
[b][size=8pt]Please Reply on the topic or pm me. Also if you have skype dont be afraid to add me! Skype: Melilshaw3[/size][/b]
